## initialiseClient variable

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Initialise the http and websocket connections and return a client that is ready to use. Use with [getConfig](./homeassistant-typescript.getconfig.md) to get the correct config values

**Signature:**

```typescript
initialiseClient: ({
  host,
  port,
  httpPath,
  websocketPath,
  token,
  logger,
}: HassConfig) => Promise<IClient>;
```

## Example

const config = getConfig() const client = await initialiseClient(config)
